Field Documentation

CodecType* CodecDevice::Properties::m_array_of_supported_codecs
 

Array of codecs supported by the CodecDevice instance.

BOOLEAN CodecDevice::Properties::m_combined_device
 

Specifies if the codec device is a combined device (e.g. a decoder/renderer combined device).

DirectionType CodecDevice::Properties::m_direction
 

Direction (de-/encoding) of the codec device.

UINT CodecDevice::Properties::m_num_of_supported_codecs
 

Number of supported codecs. It is the number of elements of m_array_of_supported_codecs.
